## Compression Garments for Plastic Surgery



Discover the Marena difference as you recover with the comfortable support of
our compression garments for plastic surgery.

Medical research has shown that compression garments may aid the healing
process from procedures that cause trauma to the body. Medical-grade
compression may help reduce swelling, reduce soreness and bruising, and
improve comfort and support.



## Abdominal Surgery

Marena Recovery garments recommended for Tummy Tuck, Liposuction,
Abdominoplasty, and other procedures of the torso.



Marena’s proprietary TriFlex™ fabric and fit helps provide the benefits of
compression while ensuring comfortable support. Our fabric feels soft against
the skin, even through extended wear.



## Hips, Buttocks Surgery

Marena Recovery compression garments for plastic surgery recommended for
Brazilian Butt Lift, Liposuction, Fat Transfer, Hip Replacement Surgery, and
other lower body procedures.

We design garments for these procedures to provide targeted compression
coverage on the hip, buttocks, and thigh. We offer special garments for
Brazilian Butt Lifts and Fat Transfer procedures.

## Chest, Breast Surgery

Marena Recovery garments recommended for Breast Augmentation, Breast Cancer,
Reconstruction, and other upper body procedures.

Marena Recovery vests and sleeves offer extra support for the chest, arms, and
upper back with compression that stays comfortable and supportive during
recovery. With hook-and-eye closures, garments can adjust to changes in
swelling and ensure the best fit.

## Dental, Facial Surgery

Marena Recovery garments recommended for Face Lift, Root Canal, Apicoectomy,
Orthodontic Treatment, and other facial procedures.

Face masks help support and comfort with compression applied in the right
areas. Look for multiple size options and neck lengths.

Contact us for information about our compression garments for plastic surgery.





## Subscribe

Sign up to get the latest on new products, company updates, and exclusive
promotions.
